alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; East Carteret; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Pamlico; Southern Craven; Tyrrell; Washington; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 10:13PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Washington, southeastern Craven, Hyde, west central Dare, southeastern Beaufort, Tyrrell, Carteret and Pamlico Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1013 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Columbia to near Janeiro to near Bogue Inlet Pier. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Cedar Island, Harkers Island, South River, North River, Belhaven, Killkenny, Manns Harbor, Davis, Swindell Fork, Alligator, Straits, Atlantic, Sladesville, Ponzer, Sealevel, Marshallberg and Scranton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; East Carteret; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Pamlico; Southern Craven; Tyrrell; Washington; West Carteret
